      public void drawHoldBlock(Block block)

    • animateLockBlock

      public void animateLockBlock(ViewData viewData)
      Animates the lock effect when a block lands and locks into place. Creates a pulse animation by scaling the block's rectangles up and back down.
      Parameters:
      viewData - The ViewData containing the block's position and shape data

    • shakeBoard

      public void shakeBoard()
      Creates a screen shake effect when a hard drop occurs. Shakes the game board randomly by small amounts and returns to center.

    • setPhantomMode

      public void setPhantomMode(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether phantom mode is enabled. In phantom mode, blocks fade to near-invisibility after locking. Also switches music based on the mode.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable phantom mode, false to disable

    • isPhantomMode

      public boolean isPhantomMode()
      Checks if phantom mode is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if phantom mode is enabled, false otherwise

    • fadeLockedBlock

      public void fadeLockedBlock(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle)
      Public method to trigger phantom fade on a rectangle. Called from BoardDisplayManager when a block locks.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - The rectangle to fade

    • flashAllBlocks

      public void flashAllBlocks()
      Flashes all visible blocks on the board for 0.2 seconds. Used when rows are cleared to help the player re-orient themselves.

    • illuminateArea

      public void illuminateArea(int boardRow, int boardCol)
      Illuminates a 2x2 radius around the given position for 0.2 seconds. Used when a block locks to briefly highlight the area.
      Parameters:
      boardRow - The row index in the board matrix (0-based, including hidden rows)
      boardCol - The column index in the board matrix (0-based)
